about_the_game:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass "Legendary Town Building Set". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

A Facility Design set provided as a part of "Legendary Town Building Set" Season Pass.

This set adds "Dusk" series inspired designs that can be chosen for ateliers and shops built in the city.
Note: You can construct facilities by opening "Town Building" in the Weekday main menu.
detailed_description:
Note: This product is included in the Season Pass "Legendary Town Building Set". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

A Facility Design set provided as a part of "Legendary Town Building Set" Season Pass.

This set adds "Dusk" series inspired designs that can be chosen for ateliers and shops built in the city.
Note: You can construct facilities by opening "Town Building" in the Weekday main menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
